root.title: Automated Collection Bookmarks Using Get-ChildItem PowerShell
root.description: Adversaries may enumerate browser bookmarks to learn more about compromised hosts. Browser bookmarks may reveal personal information about users (ex: banking sites, interests, social media, etc.) as well as details about internal network resources such as servers, tools/dashboards, or other related infrastructure.
root.author: frack113

logsource.definition: Requirements: Script Block Logging must be enabled
